The light blue is also a little see through. The opening in the back comes up a little higher than I had hoped it would when I am moving around/working out, almost showing the bottom of my sports bra in the back. This can be washed normally but do not dry!!

The fabric is a perfect flowing material that isn't stiff or thick. Very flattering and breathable

I follow the autumn color palette for my wardrobe, and this is true to color representation, so I love how it warms my skin tone. I love how the back design drapes down diagonally over my hips while exposing a bit of my lower back without being too revealing (e.g., I personally don't like showing my sports bra, and this top is low enough to hide your sports bra). The material is GREAT for intense cardio if you don't mind the sweat darkening the fabric a bit in the spots where you sweat, but (1) it dries quickly (maybe a little gross for some of you) and (2) you certainly don't feel drenched in sweat (I do boxing, and this top is gym/family-friendly and workout-friendly!). Would love this same design in a different fabric, perhaps, but I'm satisfied, nonetheless. I certainly love how I look in it! Thank you so much for crafting such a lovely belonging.
